intro: Podolepis robusta, commonly known as the robust rock-rose, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant is characterized by its succulent, fleshy leaves and vibrant yellow or orange flowers. It thrives in rocky, well-drained soils and is adapted to arid and semi-arid environments. Podolepis robusta is often found in mountainous regions and is valued for its ornamental appeal and resilience.
